ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors are grateful to Catherine Dussault and Karl Girard-Lalancette for their help with biological assays and Laboratoire PhytoChemia for advice regarding gas chromatography-flame ionization detection (GC-FID) system. We also thank Mammoud Rouhabia (Laval University) for providing HaCaT cells used in this study. This work was supported by funds from the Fonds de Recherche Nature et Technologies.
